content.rendered:
Directed by Rahul Bose. Prashant Pandey.

Written by Shreya Dev Verma.

Cast Aditi Inamdar(Poorna Malavath). Rahul Bose(Dr. R. S. Praveen Kumar). Heeba Shah(Meena Gupta). Arif Zakaria(Major khan). Azam(Dance teacher). Sekhar Babu Bachinepally(Doc at base camp). Veera Badaram(Anand’s father). Malesh Balastu(Food Contractor (as Dr. Malesh Balastu)). Ramesh Birajdar(Bhongir Man). Dhritiman Chatterjee(Alexander). Uttam Chhetry(Instructor Jyoti). Avanti Deepak(English Teacher). Keshav Deepak(G V Reddy). Surugu Harika(Priya’s Mother in law). Dr. Rayala Harischandra(Priya’s Father). Harshavardhan(CM of Andhra Pradesh). Nasreen Ishaque(Nasreen). Jagadeshwari(Priya’s Mother). Kabeer(Poorna’s father). Laxmi Kalyani(Poorna’s mother). John Kottoly(Parmesh). Manoj Kumar(Anand Kumar). Satish Kumar(Stadium section officer). Noushad Mohamed Kunju(PT Teacher). G. Lavanya(Sargam). Dorjee Lhatoo(Mountaineering expert). S. Mariya(Priya). Soumendu Mordunya(Major Sharma). Alok Naik(Village School Teacher). T.S. Narayana(Priya’s Father in law). Vamsi Nekanti(Tadwai School Principal). Arun P.(Sherpa 2). Sri Kumar P.(Sherpa 1). Laxmi Prassana(Food Matron). Ravi.Wuyyuru(Govt Hospital Doctor). Mohd. Sabha(Sabha). Dawa Sherpa(Hmi trainer 2). Passang Tenzing Sherpa(hmi trainer I). Shikant(Poorna’s probable groom). Sudeepta Singh(News Reader 2). Gyanendra Tripathi(Shekhar Babu). Sanam Verma(News Reader 1)

Language Hindi.

Producers Inder Singh Bariya. Rahul Bose. Wahi Harsh. Rhea Naidu. Sunil Dolamani Panda. Meenakshi Pandey. Amit Patni. Simran Sawhney. Meraj Shaikh.

Production Raay Medi. Rahul Bose Production.
